channel.title: thoughts on Escaping Perfection
channel.description: Recent content in thoughts on Escaping Perfection

item.title: Sorry to nobody
item.description: It’s ironic that in the process of embarking on this journey, I almost seperated myself from its purpose. To you, the reader, there would’ve been no difference whether I made this post or held off posting this site for another day. However, holding off the sharing of thoughts is the very thing that goes against this sites fundamental philosophy. Waiting. Hesitating. Perfecting… I will go into further detail when I have more time to formulate my thoughts.
